title: Installation issue: intel-mkl
body:
Hi,
I am trying to build intel-mkl@2019.5.281, but I get the following error:

```
==> 43172: intel-mkl: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> 43172: intel-mkl: Executing phase: 'install'
==> [2020-03-08-20:40:46.562172, 43177] './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg'
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please select at least one component before you continue.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```

I have tried to apply the patch in https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/10958
But still same error.

Any workaround?

Thank you very much

### Spack version
<!-- Add the output to the command below -->
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.0-161-49ec260
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack install intel-mkl@2019.5.281 %intel
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux ip-AC127404 3.10.0-1062.12.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Feb 4 23:02:59 UTC 2020 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:	CentOS 7.7
```
